description.value: This enchanted lasso is a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Net]{Net} that can be used to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} creatures up to 30 feet away, requires a @Check[type:athletics|dc:18|traits:action:force-open] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Force Open]{Force Open}, and has an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Escape]{Escape} DC of 18. It's permanently attached to a 30-foot rope. While using the lawbringer's lasso to Grapple, you receive a +1 item bonus to Grapple checks against creatures with the chaotic trait. If you roll a critical failure on your attempt to Grapple a chaotic creature with the lawbringer's lasso, you get a failure instead.
